title: Prophetic Voices #1 Science, Art & Religion -Tarkovsky, Solzhenitsyn, Jacques Ellul, Jordan Peterson
description:
(Timestamps below)  ...
This is a collection of voices discussing where we are now from the perspective of the past, mostly the 20th Century. I call them prophetic in both senses of the word.: predicting the future and giving a warning that must be listened to. I have followed a discussion of the search for truth in science, art, and religion. Clips from the following souls are used: Michael Polanyi, David Berlinski, Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn, Andrei Tarkovsky, Jacques Ellul, Bernard-Henri Levy, Francis Schaeffer, Flannery O'Connor, Hans Rookmaaker, Walker Percy and Jordan Peterson.

00:00:00  Francis Schaeffer on the End of the Christian Consensus
00:00:50  Byrne's Introduction
00:03:45 David Berlinski on What compels the Universe
00:07:30  Walker Percy on Freud and Darwin
00:15:25  Michael Polanyi talks about Science and Humility
00:22:40 David Berlinski asks if Science is the Final Arbiter of Truth
00:33:45 Andrei Tarkovsky on the Role of Art in Understanding Life
00:39:15 Jordan Peterson on the Need to Incorporate a Religious Perspective in Science
00:44:40 Bernard-Henri Levy on Relativism and Evil
00:48:00  Flannery O'Connor on the Grotesque in Literature and Life
00:53:45  Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn on the Need for Moral and Spiritual Education
00:56:50 Godfrey Reggio on living inside of the Technological Environment
00:57:30 Jacques Ellul on the Technological Trap 
01:00:05 Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn on Fighting the Lie
01:01:55 Andrei Tarkovsky on the Need for Solitude 
01:06:55  Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn on How Art Speaks Truth
01:10:15 Jacques Ellul on the Possibilities of Resistance and Hope
01:14:50 Hans Rookmaaker on the Left or Right Revolutions
01:16:50 Conclusion
......
And I'm on Twitter now. @theanadromist Feel free to find me there. https://twitter.com/anadromist
......
Please DONATE to this channel through PayPal. More than $50 at once or $10 per month will get you ten hours of AUDIO extras from the Anadromist. Click this...  
  https://www.paypal.com/donate?hosted_button_id=GE5NHN8AYL3YC
................
The Anadromous Life essay site for more in depth ideas:  https://theanadromist.wordpress.com/ Visit my Gravity From Above channel is this one: https://www.youtube.com/user/gulagzero 
The Gravity From Above site for more artistic ideas involving puppetry, music, dance and other arts.   https://gravityfromabove.wordpress.com/ 
And to understand more about my life in Georgia check out my Georgian Crossroads channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeFJ6Tm71ieNcjcUb-Trc8g
And if you want to communicate with me use The Anadromous Life Facebook page. https://www.facebook.com/theanadromist/ 
(I don't want to have to make my personal page private because I have too many 'friends'. If it's dialogue you want go there. I'll start 'community' page soon enough if the demand is there.) 

Thanks for watching, more coming soon! 
Meanwhile dig into the Anadromous past. 

From Tbilisi Georgia (Look it up on a map!) 
Swimming Against the Stream
Byrne

#jordanpeterson #solzhenitsyn #tarkovsky
